head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KERESEY, JAMES F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KERESEY, JAMES F.

block.p: KERESEY-James F. Of Upper Brookville, NY on October 5, 2000. Age 74. Loving husband of Jane for 49 years. Devoted father of Michael, Virginia and Kevin. Brother of John, Ann and Diane. Grandfather of five. A U.S. Marine Corps survivor of Guam and Iwo Jima, past President of the Creek Club, member of Augusta National and the Links. Memorial service St. John's of Lattingtown, Locust Valley, NY, Tuesday, October 10th at 11 AM. Contributions may be made to the Marine Corps Law Enforcement Foundation, P.O. Box 37, Mountain Lakes, NJ 07046.
